biotools.summary: cisTEM (computational imaging system for transmission electron microscopy) is a complete software solution for processing cryo-electron microscopy images of macromolecular complexes and obtain high-resolution 3D reconstructions from them.

bioschemas.name: cisTEM
bioschemas.summary: cisTEM (computational imaging system for transmission electron microscopy) is a complete software solution for processing cryo-electron microscopy images of macromolecular complexes and obtain high-resolution 3D reconstructions from them.
